statements.text: SELECT VA.NAME, VA.CREATOR, VA.CREATEDBY, VA.LOCATION, VA.IBMREQD, VA.REMARKS, VA.LABEL, VA.TBCREATOR, VA.TBNAME, VA.PTYPE, VA.CREATEDTS, VA.ALTEREDTS, VA.ENCODING_SCHEME, VA.RELCREATED, VA.OWNER, VA.OWNERTYPE FROM ( SELECT ' ' AS PTYPE, AL.* FROM ( SELECT AL.* FROM SYSIBM.SYSTABLES AL WHERE AL.TYPE = 'A' EXCEPT ( SELECT AL.* FROM SYSIBM.SYSTABLES AL, SYSIBM.SYSTABLES TB WHERE AL.TYPE = 'A' AND AL.TBNAME = TB.NAME AND AL.TBCREATOR = TB.CREATOR AND TB.TYPE NOT IN ('A','V','G','P','X') UNION SELECT AL.* FROM SYSIBM.SYSTABLES AL, SYSIBM.SYSTABLES TB WHERE AL.TYPE = 'A' AND AL.TBNAME = TB.NAME AND AL.TBCREATOR = TB.CREATOR AND TB.TYPE IN ('V') ) ) AL UNION SELECT TB.TYPE AS PTYPE, AL.* FROM SYSIBM.SYSTABLES AL, SYSIBM.SYSTABLES TB WHERE AL.TYPE = 'A' AND AL.TBNAME = TB.NAME AND AL.TBCREATOR = TB.CREATOR AND TB.TYPE NOT IN ('A','V','G','P','X') UNION SELECT 'V' AS PTYPE, AL.* FROM SYSIBM.SYSTABLES AL, SYSIBM.SYSTABLES TB WHERE AL.TYPE = 'A' AND AL.TBNAME = TB.NAME AND AL.TBCREATOR = TB.CREATOR AND TB.TYPE IN ('V') ) VA FETCH FIRST 100 ROWS ONLY
